UpdateLog.description:
[title]Recent News[/title][font]Small[/font]
[title]Bug Fixes[/title][font]Small[/font] - Fixed issue with DynamicDrawnWorldObjects on the world map where the mod setting wasn't properly applied
- Fixed bug where air defenses were still drawing their perimeter radius despite being disabled.
- Fixed compatibility issue with XmlExtensions, which would cause a fatal error and CTD. [title]Additional Changes[/title][font]Small[/font]
[title]Final Notes[/title][font]Small[/font] Please report any issues you find [link]https://github.com/SmashPhil/Vehicles/issues[/link](here.) or on the discord server.
